column7: Special projects in research and independent investigation in any phase of health, kinesiology, physical education, and related areas selected by the students. Approved for Letter and S/U grading. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours in separate semesters. Prerequisite: Grade-point average of 2.5; consent of instructor.
